name: Reanimator
ability: Once per game at night*, choose a dead player; they are resurrected as an evil Unliving.
flavor: His chief delights were of a less public and philanthropic kind, requiring many explanations of sounds which seemed peculiar even amidst that babel of the damned. Among these sounds were frequent revolver-shotsâ€”surely not uncommon on a battlefield, but distinctly uncommon in an hospital.
